title: Eat
data:
{{Obsolete}}
'''Eating''' (command '''e''') is the act of consuming a [[Comestibles and satiation|comestible]] in order to increase your [[Comestibles and satiation##Satiation_levels|satiation]] level.

The interface will generally prevent you from eating something that is directly harmful (such as a [[kobold]] [[chunk]] if you do not have known [[poison resistance]]).

==History==
The need to eat food was removed in [[0.26]].

[[Category:Hunger]]
